title: PBE Change?
body: I have gotten my IP/RP on my pbe but i only got 3500rp and 10000 ip. Have you changed something or is it just a bug?

replies.body: The allotted amount should be enough to help with testing.  You might see prices on the store fluctuate or some content become unavailable, but the PBE is usually in a state of flux as things are constantly changing.  Let me know if that clears things up!
doesnt everything just cost 1 rp anyways?
"doesnt everything just cost 1 rp" implies that skins cost rp...
